db:abstract.db:para: The Qt 3D module contains functionality to support near-realtime simulation systems.

db:article.db:para: The Qt 3D module contains functionality to support near-realtime simulation systems.

db:listitem.db:para: Contains classes that are the foundation for Qt 3D simulation framework, as well as classes that provide the ability to render using the Qt 3D framework.
Contains classes used for implementing QML functionality into Qt3D applications.
QAbstractAspect is the base class for aspects that provide a vertical slice of behavior.
Qt3DCore::QCameraLens specifies the projection matrix that will be used to define a Camera for a 3D scene.
The base class of scene nodes that can be aggregated by Qt3DCore::QEntity instances as a component.
Qt3DCore::QEntity is a Qt3DCore::QNode subclass that can aggregate several Qt3DCore::QComponent instances that will specify its behavior.
QNode is the base class of all Qt3D node classes used to build a Qt3D scene.
The QRay3D class defines a directional line in 3D space extending through an origin point.
The QQmlAspectEngine provides an environment for the QAspectEngine and a method for instantiating QML components.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Qt 3D module provides the foundations and core types used for near-realtime simulations built on the Qt 3D framework.
